laserschein
Class LD2000Native

java.lang.Object
  laserschein.LD2000Native

public class LD2000Native
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a Java interface for talking with the LD2000.dll. Also abstracts different datatypes of the Pangolin SDK. Caution: Very weird JNA stuff happening here.

Author:
allesblinkt
